cause.description:
This is a cause to help better the future of the literature world. There are many unpublished writers out in the world that are just waiting to get thier chance to be published. This cause will help them do just that.
1. Help unpublished writers
2. Get them published
cause.mission: help the unpublished writers to finally get thier chance to become published.
cause.name: Help unpublished writers get published
